reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan cute and trendy, with a luxurious feel and thick, soft material that keeps them warm in colder weather. The fit is good, with one customer noting it's not loose or baggy in the back, and they describe it as comfortable and cozy. The sleeve length receives mixed feedback - while some customers appreciate the long sleeves, others find them too long.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfy
items.body: This crop cardigan is a great addition to my wardrobe! The material feels soft and high-quality, making it comfortable to wear all day. The medium size fits perfectly—not too tight or too loose—and the cropped length adds a flattering touch to any outfit. The white color is versatile and looks crisp and stylish, whether paired with jeans, dresses, or skirts. It’s lightweight yet warm enough for layering. Overall, I’m very happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a cute and practical cardigan! Read more
items.author: annette G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite Cardigan shrug! Good value for price so comfortable and soft! Love it!
items.body: I absolutely love this shrug cardigan. Its one of my favorites and I have a few! It's so soft well made and sexy to complete any look! Dress ut up or down with jeans or a nice dress! Covers my old arms lol buying in all colors. Bought black! Read more
items.author: KayKay

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Sooo cute but not covering my chest enough Read more
items.author: Zoey Thompson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better quality than I expected... already bought a second one
items.body: I love this sweater. I need something for when I ice skate just to cover my arms and I've been having a hard time finding exactly what I'm looking for. Judging by the pictures it looks like it's oversized under the arm I bought an extra large which is the size I usually wear and mine's really not like that it is just a shrug that goes straight across the back and covers my arms. It's pretty soft. If I touched it walking past it in the store I wouldn't describe it as exceptionally soft but it's absolutely not scratchy the sleeves are long and come about halfway down my palm but that didn't bother me, it actually feels cozy. It's definitely thicker than I expected. It's still lightweight but I honestly thought it would feel like a thinner and cheaper version but it doesn't I bought the black one and actually just ordered a second in the apricot color. Read more
items.author: CB

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color is a bit different than expected
items.body: The color is more of a turquoise than a powder blue. I feel this is the most important thing to mention. Second, the material is not flimsy or thin it’s more of a woven material so it’s a good thickness and can keep your arms warm. It is not loose or baggy in the back, there’s just more of a opening in the front so the bicep area looks baggier. I feel like it’s more wearable for sweatpants or loungewear in the picture than in person partially because of the color and the material. The material looks and feels thicker and a bit more formal than loungewear casual (at least for me). The picture isn’t very misleading, if you look closely you can kind of tell what this fit is going to be like. I would give it a 4 because I was given pretty much what it shows on the site, but because of the color (2) and the fit (3.5) I’ll give it a 3. It has potential and decent quality! Read more
items.author: The Reviewer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: Super cute true to size and nice quality Read more
items.author: Forestt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yea
items.body: Great material worth the value of your money need everything color easy to clean and perfect for every occasion Read more
items.author: LadyGlitterGreen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutest sweater
items.body: This top is heavy weight and fits well! The sleeves are long on me but that is easy to roll! This feels super good quality and comfortable Read more
items.author: It Truly works so fast and so well! I am obsessed and did not have any sensitivity! I will definitely be buying more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, White, Light Apricot, Apricot, Coffeegrey, Black, Baby Pink, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
